maintenance-widget.title: Maintenance Mode Active
maintenance-widget.detail: The forum is currently in maintenance mode. Only users with the appropriate permission can access the forum.

maintenance-mode-auth.help: You can use developer tokens to login via /maintenance/auth/$token.
